page.title: 03BESIDE THE M4
page.content: BESIDE THE M4. Close to the M4 are the Avon County Council Highways Department buildings,dominated by a large pile of salted grit.A public weighbridge site is used to check the weight of heavy goods vehicles to ensure that they are within the Ministry of Transport weight regulations. This is a popular place for rest stops and the two large lay-bys are always full, often with commuters' cars parked for the day by car sharing drivers. A mobile snack bar at present supplies their needs. An attractive picnic site is near completion,with parking spaces,picnic tables and benches and WCs. The Water Board also has a service reservoir at this location.
